original_text: Then they went to Jesus. They saw that he was dead already. So they did not break his legs.
korean_text: 예수께 이르러서는 이미 죽으신 것을 보고 다리를 꺾지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: They saw that he was dead already
So they did not break his legs
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그의 다리를 부수지 않았습니다
